PrintÂ¶

This class is class for visualization and improvement of GUI

It contains of two basic functions:

  • window_size function which sets width and height of the screen

  • clear_screen function which prints enough new lines so the previous content is not visible above the actual one.

These functions are then widely used in the rest of the functions.
